General.Name: Korporatsiya VSMPO AVISMA PAO
General.Description: public stock company VSMPO-AVISMA Corporation produces and sells titanium in Russia and internationally. Its products include titanium, ferrotitanium, aluminum, and heat exchange equipment. The company serves aircraft construction, energy, oil and gas, building, medicine, and sports industries. public stock company VSMPO-AVISMA Corporation is based in Verkhnyaya Salda, Russia. As of April 5, 2021, the company operates as a subsidiary of Promishlennie Investitsii OOO.
